item.description:
For this session, we will hear from Brenton Graveley, Professor of Genetics and Developmental Biology at the University of Connecticut Health Center with international reputation in comparative genomics, data integration, and data visualization.  See his bio and read more about "Steven Spielberg's phenomenally successful sci-fi adventure thriller [that] follows two dinosaur experts -- Dr. Alan Grant and Dr. Ellie Sattler -- as they are invited by eccentric millionaire to preview his new amusement park on an island off Costa Rica on the website for this event:   http://www.realartways.org/cinema.htm#jurassic

(1993, USA, 127 mins)

 

Admission:
Real Art Ways Members: $5 (the same price since 1996!)
Seniors & Students Members: $4.50
Regular Admission (non-members): $10
Seniors (62+) / Students (full-time with ID): $7

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Science on Screen: "Jurassic Park" @ RAW
